page.title: 05Nosterfield End Farm
page.content: I live on Nosterfield End Farm,as my dad works there.There is a manager, foreman and 1 worker.The farm has 2ooo acres .That includes Bumstead .It grows oil seed rape ,wheat,barly ,and peas . It is owned by Hillcourt which is a big company conected with Jaguar cars.Before Hillcourt owned it, there were 3 farms, each owned by one man. Now it is only 1 farm.There are 2 tractors, 1 forklift, 2 combines, 1 Unimog sprayer.The manager has a car and the forman has a van.Nosterfield End Farm has 550 acres . The crops are mostly sold to different buyers. Here is what happens to them. Oil seed rape is cut by combines, stored in barns, dried by blowers and sold 2 weeks after harvest. Spring peas are grown on contract.
